107.title: Stream API
107.example:
// Stream API (Java 8)
List<String> result = names.stream()
    .filter(n -> n.startsWith("A"))  // filter
    .map(String::toUpperCase)         // transform
    .sorted()                          // sort
    .distinct()                        // unique
    .limit(10)                         // limit
    .collect(Collectors.toList());     // collect

// Parallel processing
long count = list.parallelStream()
    .filter(s -> s.length() > 5)
    .count();
